titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 22) proposing a balanced budget amendment to the Constitution of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Taylor (MS). Petition No: 108-3.

bill.summary: 6/12/2003--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 22 (balanced budget amendment).
